title: Nice clean temple
review: This is an old temple which is very nice & clean and also very well maintained. If you can go there at evening time you can see the "Arati" which is great.Also, there is enough place inside the temple where you can sit and spend some time.

title: Located at a height, in narrow bye-lanes of Almora!
review: This temple is located in middle of Almora town but at a height and narrow lanes.  I visited this place in late evening hours, the entire place was littered with garbage and several cows were seen eating from these dumps.

title: Nandadevi temple review
review: Despite being in the middle of the market place at Almora - it was deserted. The images on the temple are unique and remind you of Khajuraho. Well maintained, the idol of the Devi inside is bliss, few visitors though. You could walk up the Mall road for a 15  minute hike to reach here and do some local shopping on the way -

title: Peace and Serenity Promised
review: We visited this temple in the evening before sunset. Less crowd, got nice darshan inside the temple. It is small walk from the main road, the lane which goes to the temple is bit congested. You need to get your car park a bit ahead down the main road. As we were new the priest told about the origin of the Goddess Nanda, temple and the kings who built it, annual fair and the Nanda Devi Yatra which happens once in 12 years. Truly divine experience. Must visit place.

title: Mother godess the originator of all beings
review: This is a temple where you can feel the strength of the godess encompassing you with all the love and affection just like your own mother.A feeling of love is generated by you on a visit here.The temple is named after the famous himalayan peak nanda devi.

title: Jai Maa Nanda Devi
review: Beautiful scenic Almora becomes more blissful and Crowded streets of Lala Bazaar is felt much blessed in the presence of Maa Nanda.....Old stone structure with carved sanctum Santorum...the group of Temple in courtyard reckons the rich Hindu tradition where thousands of devotees ..men, women..youngsters and kids come for blessings and pray. The aromatic atomashore andsacted chants of Mantras by Pundits (mostly from Joshi clans) create a mystique fervour in the heart of Almora city. The narrow path with moderate steep makes you breath before reach this destination just walk away from above the main Road. You may face parking problem so advised to keep vehicle at designated space downward. Vishal Megamart is nearby hangout for shopping after Pooja...Bal Mithai from Mohun Singh Rautela deserve a MUST when visit this chill city..

title: holy temple having amazing natural  beauty
review: Nanda Devi temple is one of the most visited holy temples.The temple is located in Almora town above the Mall Road.Goddess Nanda Devi is said to be the destroyer of Evil. It is established within the foyer of Shiva Temple and possesses a glorious shrine adorned by a stone crown or Amalaka, enclosed by a wooden roof.

title: Shiva/Durga temple filled with pilgrims!
review: The Nanda Devi temple was filled with worshipers during my visit there which coincided with Vasanta Navaratri.  Lots of energy and a powerful space!

title: Good temple
review: The temple is inside the wholesale market and not accessible directly by driving there. You need to park vehicle on roadside and take route going via the wholesale market for walking about 250 meters from the main road. It's close to mall road multi-level parking. We faced some problem in reaching there as we could not exactly locate the place. The tall peepal tree is a landmark.

title: Nice visit
review: Visited Nanda Devi Temple on 22 Nd September 2018. It is situated in Almora main market. It is very ancient and beautifully built. It is A must visit temple.

title: Beautiful calm place in the centre of the town
review: Such calm in the midst of a bubbling bazaar. That's the USP of this temple steeped in tradition. Very peaceful to spend an hour or two here even if you are not the religiously oriented types. Just sit in the courtyard and soak in the peace. The stone carving itself is beautiful. One frieze is depicting love making postures as in many ancient temples. The other friezes at the Base show mythological stories. The carvings are slowly eroding with time, but I'm glad that in spite of being a living temple, it is maintained well and the pujaris or temple management has not defaced the beautiful stone carvings by colouring with oil paint etc.

title: Historic Temple in the heart of Almora.
review: Nanda Devi Temple, about 1000 years old, is located at the heart of Almora, just is front of my home at Almora. You will love the calm and peace in the temple premises.

title: Historical Temple Under UNESCO
review: The temple is small but comes under UNESCO for the historical and Archelogical reasons. The temple is located close to the market at Almora. One can reach here by walk if you have your hotels close by to the market.

title: Naina- Sunaina
review: Famous Nanda Devi temple is situated in heart of Nainital. Nowadays Called Nandashtami festival is running. People use to worship nowadays with great devotion at Nanda Devi temple. You can find the picture made of Naina & Sunaina Devi with special material with ornaments at this moment out of temple.

title: my own kuldevi temple
review: i heard many garhwali songs with nanda devi name in it and was always curious to be here. my parenys n grandmom was happy that i could finally viait this temple. so calm. so clean. and people woth pure hearts. two baijnath type temples were also there. overall very good experience.

title: Almora ki Nanda Devi
review: I am very happy to write review of this temple. Its very close to my heart. Nanda devi is our kuldevi. This place is very unlike i thought. It was very clean. Very calm. With very less people travelling here. Few small shops nearby for prasad. No monkeys here. Two more temples around it were beautifully done. I spend some time inside mandir doing meditation and seeking blessings from our devi for a happy healthy life.

title: Lovely
review: very clean Temple, situated near by naini lake osm view , when you  go their you feel some oora over their with great peace , you will definitely love it

title: The Most famous Nanda Devi Mandir
review: Highly Pure & Pristine Maa Nanda Devi Temple, I felt blessed that I could see Maa Nanda Devi. Reasonably close to Holiday Homes Almora.

title: Beautifull
review: Maa Nanda devi bless you with lots of happiness ..! Beautifull place .. Nice surrounding ... grt feelings ...

title: only peaceful place in the middle of the bazaar
review: this temple is located in the middle of the bazaar.

title: We need to take more care of our monuments
review: The Nanda Devi Temple, don't mind the number of stars I gave, is indeed a nice piece of architecture. What I wish is that we have more regard for maintaining our structures. The temple is still functioning and every year there is a major festival troupe that passes through here but it is evident that the primary structures are sinking in a bit.

title: small temple great view
review: great view of Himalayas from this small temple atop a hill

title: Local market  good for shopping
review: The temple is very old and historic and many activities keep happening there, The way to the temple is across the local market where handicrafts and dry fruits (anjeer and akhrot) can be purchased at cheap rates provided you bargain smartly.

title: beautiful temple with divine atmosphere
review: This temple is the beauty and situated on Naini Lake. Once you enter into the temple, you can feel such a divine feeling that I cannot explain. Although temple is situated near the market but it is total peace inside temple. I loved it so much.

title: Jai Mata Di.
review: Excellt old temple at the main road give you easy access of the temple and also you can shop in nearby shops.

title: Nice old temple!
review: Located in centre of marketing place of Almora, Lalabazar, this temples hosts idols of Nanad and Sunanda, and also there is Shiva temple in the vicinity. Poorly maintained. You can enjoy local shopping after visit.

title: Good spirituality place and shows history of naini devi eyes
review: Good spirituality place and shows history of naini devi eyes.

title: Very beautiful temple
review: This temple is very much beautiful. This place has full of positive feeling. I did meditation over here and spend at least 4-5 hours. This place is very nice place in the lap of Himalaya.

title: "JAI MAA NANDA DEVI..'
review: heritage PALACE & peace-full temple....to visit any time.......morning to evening....near of HOTEL SHIVALIK ALMORA, L.R.SHAH Road.....Near Vishal mega Mart***

title: A peaceful place with exotic fragrances
review: The Nanda Devi Temple is located at Lala Bazar, The Mall. It is very easily accessible from the main road and is yet a very quiet place. The temple is situated amidst the local market offering a wide variety of products.

title: Heritage Structure
review: an old peaceful temple a little ahead of the main bazaar. Its dedicated to Nanda Devi. Try the Bal Mithai at sweet shops around the area.

title: A 200 Years Old Temple
review: Nanda Devi Temple is situated at L.R. Sah Road in Almora.. it is believed that this temple is 200 years old... it is among the most sacred & worshiped temples of Kumaun region... the temple monument looks like a very old one.. there is an ancient idol of Nanda Devi...apart from Nanda Devi idol there are ancient idols of Hanuman Ji, Ganesh Ji & a small temple of Lord Shiva within the Nanda Devi Temple....
